europeana:record.dc:title: Addition of three species of the genus Plesionika (Crustacea: Caridea: Pandalidae) to the known Atlantic marine fauna of Colombia
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Cruz N.
Fransen C.H.J.M.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Arthropoda
Caridea
Pandalidae
Plesionika
range extensions
West Atlantic
Colombia
key
europeana:record.dc:description: In recent sampling along the Colombian Caribbean coast, three species of the genus Plesionika (P. gigliolii, P. longicauda, and P. willesi) have been added to the seven reported upon by Campos et al. (in press). P. gigliolii is now recorded for the first time from the West Atlantic. The taxonomic status of P. acanthonotus is discussed. A key to the Atlantic species of Plesionika is provided.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Addition of three species of the genus Plesionika (Crustacea: Caridea: Pandalidae) to the known Atlantic marine fauna of Colombia (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 78, 1-16)
